lead_paragraph: A garden that brought a breath of fresh air to East New York was shut down by the city, after the plants were discovered by inspectors.

headline.print_headline: Locked Out Over Marijuana, Gardeners Watch Brooklyn Oasis Wither
headline.main: Locked Out Over Marijuana, Gardeners Watch a Brooklyn Oasis Wither

snippet: A garden that brought a breath of fresh air to East New York was shut down by the city, after the plants were discovered by inspectors.
abstract: Green Gem community garden in East New York neighborhood of Brooklyn, part of parks dept's Green Thumb program has been closed, and its license revoked, after marijuana plants were found to be growing there; volunteer James McCrae, who is largely responsible for once-thriving garden's existence, says community's goal is to get permission to open garden again under new operators.
